record.title: REMOVAL OF NAME OF MEMBER AS COSPONSOR OF H.R. 1201
record.narrative:
REMOVAL OF NAME OF MEMBER AS COSPONSOR OF H.R. 1201 -- (House of Representatives - December 13, 2007)

[Page: H15443]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that my name be removed as a cosponsor of H.R. 1201, the Freedom and Innovation Revitalizing U.S. Entrepreneurship Act of 2007.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from Pennsylvania?
